string-array.name: haunt_roll_types
string-array.item: Original: roll 6 dice. Haunt begins if less than omen card count. Haunt may start early.
Legacy: roll dice = omen card count. Haunt begins if 6+. Never haunt on first 2 rolls.
Unofficial: roll dice = omen card count. Haunt begins if 7+. Never haunt on first 3 rolls.
